event_title: Collapsing Startup Time: What AI Acceleration REALLY Means for Founders & Investors - Light DAO Salon (SF)

event_sponsors.name: Light Dao
event_sponsors.description: A global community of conscious entrepreneurs and investors. Our mission is to expand the collective consciousness and co-create a thriving regenerative future for humanity.

event_speakers.name: Mariane Bekker
event_speakers.title: Co-Founder of Light Dao
event_speakers.bio: Mariane Bekker is one of the most plugged-in ecosystem leaders in the Bay Area startup world. Her team built Founders Bay from a few thousand to over 80,000 members in a year, hosting multiple IRL and online events every week to keep founders and investors ahead of the curve. She is also the powerhouse behind Women Founders Bay and the legendary GigaParties.

event_speakers.name: Ruby Yeh
event_speakers.title: Co-Founder of Light Dao
event_speakers.bio: Ruby Yeh is a co-founder of Light Dao, a fast-growing global network of entrepreneurs and investors.
